summary: Contoso Wireless offers customers a variety of upgrade options, allowing them to upgrade their device whenever they'd like. Customers can upgrade to any of the latest models that are compatible with their current plan and may be eligible for discounts or perks if they switch plans. Upgrading their device can improve performance and battery life, as well as give them access to new features and apps. Customers should review the Terms and Conditions before making their decision, and contact customer service if they have any questions.
